item.title: At least 1 dead in Pennsylvania US Steel plant explosion, with others trapped under rubble
item.description: An explosion rocked the U.S. Steel Clairton Coke Works facility near Pittsburgh Monday, leaving people trapped beneath the rubble, officials said.
